abstract: Zynga announced new games and what it is calling Project Z: a new platform, separate from Facebook, tailored just for games.
snippet: Zynga announced new games and what it is calling Project Z: a new platform, separate from Facebook, tailored just for games.
lead_paragraph: 9:01 p.m. | Updated SAN FRANCISCO - "Oh, thank you for saving me!" squeals Giselle the Lovely Maiden in CastleVille, the latest effort from the game company Zynga.

headline.main: Zynga Releases New Games and a New Platform
